knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE, error = TRUE)

# Installing the dataset
```{r}

DWTS_data <- read.csv("2026_MCM_Problem_C_Data.csv")
```


# Eliminating missing observations
```{r}

airport_fare_clean <- airport_fare[apply(is.na(airport_fare), MARGIN = 1, sum) == 0, ]
national_fare_clean <- national_fare[apply(is.na(national_fare), MARGIN = 1, sum) == 0, ]

# data visualization for airport_fare_clean
airport_text <- capture.output(summary(airport_fare_clean))
airport_grob <- grid.text(paste(airport_text, collapse = "\n"), x = 0.05, y = 0.95, just = "left")
png("airport_output.png", width = 800, height = 400, res = 150)
grid.draw(airport_grob)
dev.off()

# data visualization for national_fare_clean
national_text <- capture.output(summary(national_fare_clean))
national_grob <- grid.text(paste(national_text, collapse = "\n"), x = 0.05, y = 0.95, just = "left")
png("national_output.png", width = 800, height = 400, res = 150)
grid.draw(national_grob)
dev.off()
```


# Changing necessary variables to factor
```{r}

airport_fare_clean$Airport <- factor(airport_fare_clean$Airport)
airport_fare_clean$Quarter <- factor(airport_fare_clean$Quarter)
airport_fare_clean$Year <- factor(airport_fare_clean$Year)

national_fare_clean$Quarter <- factor(national_fare_clean$Quarter)
national_fare_clean$Year <- factor(national_fare_clean$Year)
```


# Save as a new csv file
```{r}

write.csv(airport_fare_clean, "airport_dataclean.csv", row.names = FALSE)
write.csv(national_fare_clean, "national_dataclean.csv", row.names = FALSE)
```
